creator: rodney.cheater@dsto.defence.gov.au
text:
The Javadoc task should take the value of its link attribute relative to the 
base directory rather than the Javadoc destination directory.

creator: bodewig@apache.org
text:
I've added a new attribute resolveLink to the nested <link> element since changing
the default looked dangerous.

Fixed with nightly build 2005-03-18.

creator: bodewig@apache.org
text: *** Bug 28765 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
